questions.question: What is the primary role of a Community Coordinator in healthcare settings?
questions.optionB: To lead community health initiatives and programs

questions.question: Which of the following is a key component of strategic planning?
What is the most effective approach to team building?
Why is stakeholder engagement important in community health programs?
questions.optionB: To ensure program success and sustainability

questions.question: Which ethical principle involves treating all community members fairly?
